Mike Pence may have even forced the NRA's hand on whether or not to score the Senate vote on Elena Kagan . The NRA scored the vote on Sonia Sotomayor , the first time they have scored a vote on a Supreme Court justice, a score that will knock down the grades of usually-reliable Democrats like Harry Reid of Nevada. by thieves who climbed up a fire escape and then used ropes to lower themselves into the museum. The thieves appear to have carefully selected some of the most valuable objects while ignoring less important artefacts. They are not something you would come and randomly find, an Egyptologist at Cairo's American University, Salima Ikram Said Salima Ikram , told Reuters. Restoration work has already started at the museum to repair the damage by looters. Zahi Hawass said that 70 pieces were damaged.

has joined the Defending Social Security Caucus newly organized by fellow Democratic Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont. "Social Security has not contributed a dime to the debt or the deficit," he said, calling the program rock-solid for at least another 27 years. That was a reference to the moment when Social Security's trustees project that the system's trust fund-- financed by payroll taxes that are segregated from other federal levies-- will run out.
